name: Misha Ruins Everything
overview: Educational comedy television series starring Michael Galustyan.  The series aims to debunk misconceptions that pervade our society in general, and an average Gorshkov family in particular, while  Misha, in plethora of different roles and  transformations, will teach us and the Gorshkovs to pinpoint the incorrect beliefs, urban legends and myths, and marketing ploys that surround our life.
